projectGridLines.title: Automation of Model Monitoring
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

·        Monthly Model Monitoring Dashboard to track targeting model performance

·        Incorporate key sub segments to review model performance (eg: key strategic segments, campaign types, etc.)

Skill sets:

·        Software Engineering

·        Experience in Hive, Python/pyspark programming, Visualization tool (Tableau/Power BI)

Traits expectation :

·        Expected learning: Data pipelines and Marketing frameworks, Coding proficiency, Ability to integrate information from different sources in a coherent manner and interpret data to bring out key trends & identify opportunity areas

Specific courses required for project execution: hands on coding in pyspark, hive, python, hql& visualization tools courses.
